thread.title: Beyoncé strips off to chainmail bikini version of golden Grammy's outfit to celebrate growing baby bump
thread.title_full: Beyoncé strips off to chainmail bikini version of golden Grammy's outfit to celebrate growing baby bump

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Beyoncé strips off to chainmail bikini version of golden Grammy's outfit to celebrate growing baby bump
text:
Beyoncé strips off to chainmail bikini version of golden Grammy's outfit to celebrate growing baby bump Pregnant Beyoncé poses nearly naked in golden bikini Share   Beyonce STUNS in first performance since announcing pregnancy Share this video     
Beyoncé looked incredible as she performed all in gold at the Grammy’s last night. 
And now the pregnant star – who’s expecting twins with her husband Jay Z – has stripped off to reveal more of the concept behind her golden goddess outfit. 
Last night, Bey was dressed in an ethereal gold gown and sparkling crown. 
But today the expectant mum of one revealed her baby bump in all its glory in a gold chainmail bikini. Beyoncé shows off her baby bump in new pictures (Photo: Daniela Vesco) 
Beyoncé poses with her mum Tina Knowles and daughter Blue Ivy in the new photos. 
Last night, Beyoncé made sure she pulled out all the stops for her stand-out performance. 
Introduced by her mother Tina, the superstar sang ballads Love Drought and Sandcastles. Pregnant star stripped to a gold chainmail bikini (Photo: Daniela Vesco) 
Dressed in an ethereal gold gown and sparkling gold crown, the expectant star held her growing belly as she appeared on stage with her backing dancers. 
As she took a seat on a huge chair at the end of a long table that was surrounded by her dancers, she broke out into song. (Photo: Getty Images North America) (Photo: Getty Images North America) Recording artist Beyonce (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
Coloured petals fell from the sky and covered the floor below. 
As she finished, cameras panned to her husband Jay Z who was giving her a standing ovation and adorable daughter Blue who was also clapping her mum. Blue Ivy Carter and Jay Z (Photo: Getty Images North America) Recording artist Beyonce (Photo: Getty Images North America) (Photo: Getty Images North America) (Photo: REUTERS) 
Viewers were flooding Twitter with praise for the star, saying it was one of her most "beautiful" performances to date. 
"Beyoncé was serving pregnant goddess realness and I was living!" said one, while another joked, "Was I just baptised I think I was!"
